title: What Future
writer: Amanda Dow, Amanda Dow (story), Harry Kakatsakis (story), Jane Petrov, Jane Petrov (story)
actors: Harry Kakatsakis, Amanda Dow, Tess Oswalt, Barbara Lee Bragg
plot: What Future is about a mother, Anne, who severely neglects herself, her family and her environment when it comes to good health habits, recycling and the conservation of Earth's resources. One day, Jill, a time-traveling scientist arrives to convince Anne to change her ways. As the two women travel into the future together, Anne witnesses unspeakable devastation to human life and the planet. Will she take responsibility for her behavior in the present before it's too late?
